parameters: \N<Yuia>Mother!
\N<Zuuteruka>Hm?
op_スーイア1a
\N<Yuia>Zuuteruka...!!

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, if it isn't Yuia. I was expecting you to come,
though you're later than I thought, huh?
\N<Yuia>Zuuteruka... you bastard... what have you done...!!

Into Yuia's eyes leapt the sight of his mother, Princess
Consort Suia, filled with desperation. And surrounding the
princess consort were Luda's soldiers, encircling her with
lewd smiles on their faces.
\N<Princess Consort Suia>Yuia... wh-what are you doing here!?

\N<Yuia>I've come to save you, Mother...! Please wait! I'll dispose
of these men and save you...!
op_スーイア1b
\N<Princess Consort Suia>Wait! Stop right there!
\N<Yuia>Eh...!?

At his mother's unexpected command to stop, Yuia's feet
halted. Segi stood by his side, watching the situation
unfold.
\N<Yuia>Wh-what do you mean!? Mother!

\N<Princess Consort Suia>You came to save me? Through flames and smoke, braving the
dangers of this castle overrun by Luda's vanguard, you came
to rescue your mother...!?
\N<Yuia>Mo-Mother...?

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, you can still talk so firmly... I thought for sure
you'd be too scared to even make a sound.

While embracing Princess Consort Suia's shoulder, Zuuteruka
muttered with a smile. However, she, being a princess
consort, did not seem to care and continued speaking with a
resolute attitude.

\N<Princess Consort Suia>You've risked your life to come here... to save your mother.
If that's the case, it is nothing but a shameful folly.

\N<Princess Consort Suia>Yuia, what you should be doing now is not risking danger to
save me. What you must do is protect Segi and leave this
castle immediately.
\N<Yuia>Wh-what... Mother...!?
\N<Segi>Princess Consort...

\N<Princess Consort Suia>You must not let our bloodline end here. Protecting your own
life, which carries your father's blood... that is what
should take precedence right now.
\N<Yuia>Th-that can't be...

\N<Princess Consort Suia>Yuia, I thought I raised you to be wise...! Was it just a
parent's wishful thinking!? Can't you understand even this
simple thing...!?
\N<Yuia>Mother... but...!
op_スーイア1e
\N<Princess Consort Suia>...!?

Zuuteruka's hand reached for Princess Consort Suia's
clothing. The sound of her silk being torn echoed faintly in
the private chamber.
\N<Princess Consort Suia>Ah... ugh...!?
\N<Yuia>Zuuteruka! You bastard!!

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, nice. Risking your life to protect your son...
That's truly exemplary of a mother.

\N<Zuuteruka>Hey, Yuia. Your mother says this, see? What will you do?
Huh? If you're going to tuck your tail and run away as she
says, I might just let you.
\N<Segi>Yu-Yuia-sama...
\N<Yuia>Grr... grrr...!

\N<Princess Consort Suia>Yuia! Do you still not understand after all I've said!? Make
a decision! Coward!!

Even as the invaders stripped her of her clothes and
subjected her to humiliations she had never experienced
before, she still looked straight at her son Yuia and
admonished him with a strong tone.
\N<Yuia>Ugh... grrr...!!
\N<Segi>Princess Consort... Yuia...-sama...
\N<Luda Soldier>Ga... ah!?
\N<Zuuteruka>Hm? What's going on?
\N<Orugi>Zuuteruka... you bastard...
\N<Seno>Princess Consort Suia...
\N<Segi>Dad! Mom!
\N<Luda Soldier>Hey, hey... what's this? Who the hell are you guys?
\N<Orugi>...

\N<Zuuteruka>Well, well, if it isn't my master and his wife. Why are you
here?
\N<Orugi>Zuuteruka... is this your doing?

\N<Seno>I knew you were up to something, but this is beyond what I
expected... You're prepared, aren't you?
\N<Zuuteruka>Prepared? What exactly should I be prepared for?

\N<Seno>Don't play dumb. After all you've done, you know what I
mean, don't you?

\N<Luda Soldier>Don't ignore us. What have you been talking about this whole
time?

\N<Seno>I'll deal with you lot later. Right now, I'm talking to this
unworthy disciple. Don't interrupt.

\N<Luda Soldier>Deal with us? Hehehe, that sounds good. You've got quite a
nice body there. So, lady, are you going to "deal" with
us?
\N<Orugi>...Stay away from my wife.
\N<Luda Soldier>Guh... ah...!?

\N<Zuuteruka>Impressive. As expected of my master. Even after retiring as
a warrior and becoming a mere castle gardener, your skills
haven't faded.

\N<Zuuteruka>And the wife is as formidable as ever. Looks like ordinary
soldiers won't stand a chance against her.

\N<Seno>Stop your idle chatter. If you think so, then surrender.
It's an offer from your former master. If you surrender
peacefully, I might even help reduce your sentence.

\N<Zuuteruka>That's a tempting offer, but well... what shall we
do?

\N<Seno>Segi... take this opportunity to escape with Lord
Yuia.
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Seno>Hurry. We must not lose hope in a place like this, no matter
what.
\N<Segi>But what about mom and dad...?

\N<Seno>Your father and I will be fine. Do you think we'd let these
guys do anything to us? We'll catch up soon.
\N<Orugi>Your mother is right. Hurry... Segi.
\N<Segi>Understood... Come on, Lord Yuia, let's go...

\N<Yuia>But... to leave my father's enemy right before my
eyes...!

\N<Orugi>Keep your resolve in your heart and live on; there will come
a day when you can avenge your father. Now is not that time.
You must not make the wrong decision.
\N<Yuia>...

\N<Segi>Come on, Lord Yuia, we must hurry. Father is right... we
can't afford to lose our lives here.
\N<Yuia>...

\N<Zuuteruka>Hey, hey, master and madam? What have you been secretly
plotting over there?

\N<Seno>Hmph, it's none of your business. Besides, aren't we your
opponents? Focus on us.
\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe...
air03
A
